con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="SmartBear Library">get books, authors, subjects</doc> <resources base="http://localhost:8065//personalAPIs/TestLibrary/1.0"> <resource path="books" id="/books"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/books"/> <method name="GET" id="GET"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="GET">Returns array based on book search params. searches books</doc> <request> <param name="title" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="title Parameter">title search parameter</doc> </param> <param name="author" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="author Parameter">author search parameter</doc> </param> <param name="subject" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="subject Parameter">subject search parameter</doc> </param> </request> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST" id="POST"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="POST">Creates a new book in the DB, on success returns book json object create new book resource</doc> <request/> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="books/{id}" id="/books/{id}"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/books/{id}"/> <param name="id" type="xs:string" required="true" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="id Parameter">book id</doc> </param> <method name="GET" id="GET"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="GET">Returns array based of search params. returns book object</doc> <request> <param default="" name="id" type="xs:string" required="true" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="id Parameter">book id</doc> </param> </request> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="DELETE" id="DELETE"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="DELETE">Returns deleted object remove book resource</doc> <request> <param default="" name="id" type="xs:string" required="true" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="id Parameter">book id</doc> </param> </request> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="authors" id="/authors"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/authors"/> <method name="GET" id="GET"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="GET">Returns array based on author search params. searches authors</doc> <request> <param name="first_name" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="first_name Parameter">first name search parameter</doc> </param> <param name="last_name" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="last_name Parameter">last name search parameter</doc> </param> </request> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="PUT" id="PUT"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="PUT">Returns deleted object remove book resource</doc> <request/> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="DELETE" id="DELETE"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="DELETE">Returns deleted object remove book resource</doc> <request/> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resources> </application>
